title: Social Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Course Through Problem-Based Learning (PBL) in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: An advanced course for office/administrative workers to strengthen social problem-solving competencies. Implementing blended learning in a limited-technology environment (no PCs, smartphone-centric)

learning_goals: Learners can derive core causes of field-oriented social problems with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can execute team-based problem-solving solutions at least three times using online-offline collaboration tools.
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans and complete course requirements with over 90% attendance.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
